page.title: 07High Street,Great Ayton.
page.content: Great Ayton{High Street}is a very popular place with both tourists and local people.It is at its busiest on Saturdays.Flowing alongside the High Street is the attractive{River Leven. One of the main attractions,{Captain {Cook's}museum is to be found at 99 High Street.Outside the shops there are only about 80 parking places for cars.As the road is narrow this often causes severe{congestion. We visited the High Street on Wednesday June 19th. It was typical afternoon. A student strode into the{old library}counting his pennies. In the{dentist's surgery, painless operations were carried out, while in the opticians,eyes were being tested. The houses on the High Street, mostly stone-built,vary from detached to terraced.Great Ayton High Street is a lively,historical place to visit.
